subtests.name: Can set 'border-image-width' to CSS-wide keywords: initial
Can set 'border-image-width' to CSS-wide keywords: inherit
Can set 'border-image-width' to CSS-wide keywords: unset
Can set 'border-image-width' to CSS-wide keywords: revert
Can set 'border-image-width' to var() references:  var(--A)
Can set 'border-image-width' to a length: 0px
Can set 'border-image-width' to a length: -3.14em
Can set 'border-image-width' to a length: 3.14cm
Can set 'border-image-width' to a length: calc(0px + 0em)
Can set 'border-image-width' to a percent: 0%
Can set 'border-image-width' to a percent: -3.14%
Can set 'border-image-width' to a percent: 3.14%
Can set 'border-image-width' to a percent: calc(0% + 0%)
Can set 'border-image-width' to a number: 0
Can set 'border-image-width' to a number: -3.14
Can set 'border-image-width' to a number: 3.14
Can set 'border-image-width' to a number: calc(2 + 3)
Can set 'border-image-width' to the 'auto' keyword: auto
Setting 'border-image-width' to a time throws TypeError
Setting 'border-image-width' to an angle throws TypeError
Setting 'border-image-width' to a flexible length throws TypeError
Setting 'border-image-width' to a URL throws TypeError
Setting 'border-image-width' to a transform throws TypeError
'border-image-width' does not supported '2em 3em'
'border-image-width' does not supported '5% 15% 10%'
'border-image-width' does not supported '5% 2em 10% auto'
